items.sentence: Tom was too shy to take part in games with the other boys.
You look like you\'ve been doing something you shouldn\'t.
I know Mary and Alice, but I\'ve never met their husbands.
I know Tom probably didn\'t do what he was supposed to do.
Is it OK to feed my dog the same thing that I feed my cat?
It was because of the accident that I was late for school.
Tom woke Mary up at 6:30 and she wasn\'t happy about that.
We don\'t really have to talk about this right now, do we?
Tom doesn\'t want to spend the rest of his life in prison.
If you don\'t have this key, you won\'t be able to get in.
